Posts.Content: Hi everyone  i have just been diagnosed with hormonal positive Lubular breast cancer in right breast and suspect left breast. In right breast 3cm and. 0.08mm lumps seen on mammogram and ultrasound. Going for MRI Wednesday now before they make a  decision on my surgery. I am absolutely terrified for my life, completely in shock and unsure how I am going to cope. Wanted to share this with you all and be grateful for any support advice Thank you, Kaz18
Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Granny 59 thank you so much for your reply and your support. Fantastic news you are through the other side, proud of you girl!! I know i need to get strong. I am 48 years old and know nothing about this particular type of breast cancer apart from what I have read on Google then I get even more scared. Did you have it in both breast ? Keep on moving forward in recovery big hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Helsjw, so sorry to hear your also experiencing this horrible and scary situation big hugs xx I wish you all the best and keep us posted. I will need this forum for support. I feel very strange snce diagnosis not so much as ill but just numb. This 3cm lump of mine has been there a while, gp said keep an eye on it but it didn't go away and started to be sore to touch. Both breasts very lumpywith hormonal changes as going through menopause so was difficult to dicifer the bad lumps. Take care ️
Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Granny59 thank you again for your positive feed back I will be keeping in touch appreciate your input and help. So good to hear great stories of recovery xxx
Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Jo 36 thank you for your story, your an amazing woman for getting through this and I take inspiration from you, I hope I can be as brave as you. Lots of hugs and love. Currently I am in the dark place, terrified it's spread and terrified of surgery, basically terrified for my life. I have re married 3 years ago we have 4 children between us (adults now) 24, 21 19 and 16 but they need us both and we have lots of plans to move abroad etc I pray this will go ahead. I will go for MRI tomorrow

Posts.Title: Hormone positive lobular breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Helsjw thank you for asking. Yes my biopsy results was hormone positive that's all I know about it they didn't explain anymore than that. MRI wasn't pleasant but then nothing is with this dam illness. Got drip on and dye inserted during it..like you am worried about all scans tests etc and terrified. Has to have a lie down this afternoon felt pretty drained with the stress and worry..let me now how you go tomorrow with your MRI and good luck..Big hug xx
